Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends certain provisions authorizing the county of Hamilton to impose a county recording tax on obligations secured by mortgages on real property
Summary: Extends certain provisions authorizing the county of Hamilton to impose a county recording tax on obligations secured by mortgages on real property to December 1, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 326 of the laws of 2006 amending the tax law relating to authorizing the county of Hamilton to impose a county recording tax on obligations secured by mortgages on real property, in relation to extending the expiration thereof
